titleStmt.title: Articles of visitation & enquiry concerning matters ecclesiastical, exhibited to the ministers, church-wardens and side-men, of the diocess of Bath and Wells, at the triennial visitation of the Right Reverend Father in God, Peter, Lord Bishop of the that diocess
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Diocese of Bath and Wells. Bishop (1672-1684 : Mews)
